channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-1227] Welcome screen when logging into fuse - should only display the create fabric if no fabric exists
item.description:
I log into jboss fuse on open shift, notice the welcome screen

[myfuse-davsclaus2.rhcloud.com container]\> bin/client
 
client: JAVA_HOME not set; results may vary
 
4591 [pool-2-thread-3] WARN org.apache.sshd.client.keyverifier.AcceptAllServerKeyVerifier - Server at /127.7.11.129:23101 presented unverified key:
 
______    _          _      _____
 
|  ___|  | |        (_)    |  _  |
 
| |_ __ _| |__  _ __ _  ___ \ V /
 
|  _/ _` | '_ \| '__| |/ __|/ _ \
 
| || (_| | |_) | |  | | (__| |_| |
 
\_| \__,_|_.__/|_|  |_|\___\_____/
 
  Fabric8 Container (1.0.0.redhat-348)
 
  http://fabric8.io/
 
 
 
Type 'help' to get started
 
and 'help [cmd]' for help on a specific command.
 
Hit '<ctrl-d>' or 'osgi:shutdown' to shutdown this container.
 
 
 
Open a browser to http://localhost:8181 to access the management console
 
 
 
Create a new Fabric via 'fabric:create'
 
or join an existing Fabric via 'fabric:join [someUrls]'
 
 
 
Fabric8:admin@myfuse> info
 
Karaf
 
  Karaf version               2.3.0.redhat-610348
 
  Karaf home                  /var/lib/openshift/5305f55a500446838a000277/fuse/fabric8-karaf-1.0.0.redhat-348
 
  Karaf base                  /var/lib/openshift/5305f55a500446838a000277/fuse/fabric8-karaf-1.0.0.redhat-348
 
  OSGi Framework              org.apache.felix.framework - 4.0.3.redhat-610348
 
 
 
JVM
 
  Java Virtual Machine        OpenJDK Server VM version 24.45-b08
 
  Version                     1.7.0_51
 
  Vendor                      Oracle Corporation
 
  Uptime                      13 minutes
 
  Total compile time          1 minute
 
Threads
 
  Live threads                82
 
  Daemon threads              51
 
  Peak                        101
 
  Total started               1753
 
Memory
 
  Current heap size           94,832 kbytes
 
  Maximum heap size           699,136 kbytes
 
  Committed heap size         147,200 kbytes
 
  Pending objects             0
 
  Garbage collector           Name = 'PS Scavenge', Collections = 51, Time = 1.520 seconds
 
  Garbage collector           Name = 'PS MarkSweep', Collections = 0, Time = 0.000 seconds
 
Classes
 
  Current classes loaded      8,589
 
  Total classes loaded        8,589
 
  Total classes unloaded      0
 
Operating system
 
  Name                        Linux version 2.6.32-431.el6oso.bz844450.x86_64
 
  Architecture                i386
 
  Processors                  2
 
Fabric8:admin@myfuse> fabric:status
 
[profile]                                [instances]    [health]
 
fabric                                   1              100%
 
fabric-ensemble-0000-1                   1              100%
 
Fabric8:admin@myfuse>

but there is already an existing fabric.

Maybe we could change the welcome text to somthing about that there is already a fabric, or at least skip the part about create/join a fabric.
item.summary: Welcome screen when logging into fuse - should only display the create fabric if no fabric exists

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Claus Ibsen When connect / restart fuse 6.2 with already created fabric, I still see the info Create a new Fabric via 'fabric:create'

bin/client
 
Logging in as admin
 
1009 [sshd-SshClient[65ad3946]-nio2-thread-4] WARN org.apache.sshd.client.keyverifier.AcceptAllServerKeyVerifier - Server at [/0.0.0.0:8101, DSA, 10:05:cc:47:83:10:f3:0c:78:d9:34:01:4b:8d:8f:a8] presented unverified {} key: {}

| |__| | |_) | (_) \__ \__ \ | |  | |_| \__ \  __/
 
 \____/|____/ \___/|___/___/ |_|   \__,_|___/\___|
 
 
 
  JBoss Fuse (6.2.0.redhat-133)
 
  http://www.redhat.com/products/jbossenterprisemiddleware/fuse/
 
 
 
Hit '<tab>' for a list of available commands
 
and '[cmd] --help' for help on a specific command.
 
 
 
Open a browser to http://localhost:8181 to access the management console
 
 
 
Create a new Fabric via 'fabric:create'
 
or join an existing Fabric via 'fabric:join [someUrls]'
 
 
 
Hit '<ctrl-d>' or 'osgi:shutdown' to shutdown JBoss Fuse.
 
 
 
JBossFuse:admin@root> fabric:welcome 
Welcome to JBoss Fuse
 
 
 
This container root is a Fabric ensemble server.
 
Web management console available at: http://dhcp-10-40-2-191.brq.redhat.com:8181/hawtio

Did I miss something?
